page.title: 11Dairy Farming Old Glossop
page.content: {Hall Fold Farm}is situated in{ {Old Glossop.}The farmer owns the farm and has lived there since{1947.}He has been a farmer all of his life.{Five} people work on the farm,{three}full time and{two}part-time. The farm is a{hundred acres}in size, and is a dairy farm. The farm has{60}milk cattle,{20}young stock and {1}bull. Equipment consists of{3} tractors plus milking equipment. The farmer has a dog called Bob, a cross between a collie and an alsatian which helps round up the cattle. Some fodder has to be fed to the cattle since the farm has not enough grazing land. Much of the land to the north is rough moorland grazing, and urban areas surround the rest preventing expansion. For more details see also the next page.
